short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance live content with Stream! Boost X Spaces, YouTube Live, and Twitch with overlays, gamified interactions, and web3 rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Level up your live content with StreamPod, the ultimate extension for creators and fans. Stream enhances your favorite live content platforms, including X (formerly known as Twitter) Spaces, Youtube Live and Twitch, with engaging in-stream overlays, gamified interactions, and web3 rewards, making your streams more interactive and rewarding.

StreamPod Key Features:
1. Interactive Overlays: Engage with your favorite creators/fans through dynamic overlay experiences and mini-games.
2. Community Building: Foster stronger connections with your fellow fans through community-driven features.
3. Rewards: Earn incentives and rewards by simply watching content from your favorite creators.
4. Universal Compatibility: Watch live content on your favorite platforms. No switching needed!

Join the future of streaming and take your content to the next level with Stream!

Change log:
- various bug fixes and security enhancements
